alert.name: VM disk size limit reached CRITICAL

alert.message: Server RAM usage is CRITICALLY HIGH
alert.name: VM high RAM usage CRITICAL

targets.expr:
rabbitmq_queue_consumers{job="kubernetes-service-endpoints",
  queue!~".*retry",
  queue!~"reporting-service-sync-.*",
  queue!~".*-exchange-tracker",
  queue!~"^SIS.+",
  queue!~"^sis.+",
  queue!~"^Sis.+",
  queue!~"^DESKTOP.+",
  queue!~"messaging-upgraded-services",
  queue!~"reporting-service-sync.source-exchange-created",
  queue!~"health-status-result-test",
  queue!~"^reporting-service-sync.+",
  queue!~".+-v1.+",
  queue!~".+-v2.+",
  queue!~"^macadmins.+",
  queue!~"^localhost.+",
  queue!~"^[0-9].+",
  queue!~"health-status-result",
  queue!~"^kube-master-dev.+",
  queue!~".*docker.*"
  } < 1

(sum_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(service_request_seconds_bucket{kubernetes_namespace=~".+", kubernetes_name=~"authorizationservice-v1|authservice-v1|authservicejwt-v1|kbservice-v1|mlservice-v1|pageservice-v1|policyservice-v1|roleservice-v1|umservice-v1|userdataservice-v1", method!="OPTION"}[$__rate_interval]) )  by (le,kubernetes_name,kubernetes_namespace))  <= bool 0.5) [5m:] )            
/
sum_over_time((sum(rate(service_request_seconds_count{kubernetes_namespace=~".+", kubernetes_name=~"authorizationservice-v1|authservice-v1|authservicejwt-v1|kbservice-v1|mlservice-v1|pageservice-v1|policyservice-v1|roleservice-v1|umservice-v1|userdataservice-v1", method!="OPTION"}[$__rate_interval])) by (kubernetes_name,kubernetes_namespace) > bool 0) [5m:]))*100

(sum_over_time((
  (
    (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~".+", kubernetes_namespace=~".+", status!~"5.."}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name,kubernetes_namespace))
    /
    (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~".+", kubernetes_namespace=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name,kubernetes_namespace))
  ) > bool 0.995
  +
  (sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~".+", kubernetes_namespace=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name,kubernetes_namespace) == bool 0)
)[5m:])
/
count_over_time(sum(rate(service_response_status_total{kubernetes_name=~".+", kubernetes_namespace=~".+"}[2m])) by (kubernetes_name,kubernetes_namespace)[5m:])
)*100
